headline: Zacks Industry Outlook Highlights Marriott International, Hilton Worldwide and Hyatt Hotels
summary: Marriott, Hilton and Hyatt navigate cost pressures and softer demand, but RevPAR gains and expansion plans support 2026 growth outlooks.

headline: Marriott International in Lodging (World) Company Profile 2026: Company Shares by Region, Financial Performance, Its Marketing Strategies, Challenges from the Competition and Future Prospects
summary: Key market opportunities for Marriott include expanding mid-market concepts and leveraging its Bonvoy loyalty program to enhance direct sales. The company is focusing on international expansion, reducing reliance on North America and targeting niche segments such as outdoor enthusiasts.Dublin, Feb. 27, 2026 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- The "Marriott International in Lodging (World)" company profile has been added to ResearchAndMarkets.com's offering.This Marriott International in Lodging (World) Company
